pizzaShop.controller

Class CartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzaShop.controller.CartController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="cart")
public class CartController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that contains the Cart abd creates PizzaOrder's

    joris

        cart - Cart for the order
